channel.title: Posts on Jacob Ingalls Family Reunion
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jacob Ingalls Family Reunion

item.title: Ingalls Reunion 2018
item.description: All Members of The Jacob Ingalls Family Are Invited To Meet In The GREENVILLE-NORTON HILL UNITED METHODIST CHURCH HALL On Route 81, Norton Hill, New York For Their 90th Annual Reunion SATURDAY, OCTOBER 13, AT 11:30 A.M. Each to furnish toward Lunch, except Meat, Biscuits and Butter which will be provided from the General Fund The Warren T. and Clarence Ingalls Families Will Host

item.title: 2017 Ingalls Family Reunion details
item.description: All Members of The Jacob Ingalls Family Are Invited To Meet In The GREENVILLE-NORTON HILL UNITED METHODIST CHURCH HALL On Route 81, Norton Hill, New York For Their 89th Annual Reunion SATURDAY, OCTOBER 14, AT 11:30 A.M. Each to furnish toward Lunch, except Meat, Biscuits and Butter which will be provided from the General Fund The Ruth and T. Merritt Elliott Family Will Host   Ingall Reunion October 14, 2017

item.title: 2016 Ingalls Reunion meeting minutes
item.description: The minutes from the 88th Ingalls reunion are available at: 88th Ingalls Reunion Minutes

item.title: Minutes from 86th and 87th Annual Reunion
item.description: The minutes from the 86th and this years 87th annual reunion are now available in the minutes section of the website. Next year’s reunion is set for Saturday, October 15, 2016 in the usual location.

item.title: 87th ANNUAL INGALLS REUNION – SAT OCT 17, 2015

item.title: New section for documents
item.description: Click the Minutes link to view minutes from past reunions and click Documents for other historical information.

item.title: Ingalls Reunion 2014
item.description: All members of the Jacob Ingalls Family Are Invited To Meet In The GREENVILLE-NORTON HILL UNITED METHODIST CHURCH HALL On Route 81, Norton Hill, New York For Their 86th Annual Reunion Saturday, October 18, at 11:30 A.M. Each to furnish toward Lunch, except Meat, Biscuits, and Butter which will be provided from the General Fund The Warren and Clarence Ingalls Families Will Host
